author: Haidee Chu
title: How to fundraise for coronavirus relief on social media
description: Novel crises often come with complications that warrant widespread responses from the general public. Part of that response can be fundraising. In the case of the COVID-19 pandemic, that means directing funds to researching vaccines and treatments; securing s…
